enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the collection by removing elements, which can be used to set up a similar state for testing.
Both methods involve removing elements from the collection, which can be used to set up a state where elements need to be removed.
After removing elements, both methods require reindexing the collection, which can be used to verify the post-condition of the removeIf method.
The contains method can be used to verify that the elements removed by removeIf are no longer present in the collection.
